p:
The adapters were removed from raw sequence reads using Trim Galore pipeline v.0.4.5
1 , and the reads were quality-trimmed and filtered by Prinseq-lite ( Schmieder and Edwards, 2011). Reads were assembled de novo by IDBA-UD assembler v.1.1.3 ( Peng et al., 2012). Additionally, the 3â€² and 5 ends were verified using reference mapping based on norovirus prototype strains obtained from GenBank. Genome management and annotation were conducted in Geneious 9.1.2 ( Kearse et al., 2012). The whole sequences of norovirus were deposited in GenBank under the accession numbers MN525275, MN525276 and MT474045/MT474046 for the GII.P16/GII.4 strains and MT474032-MT474044/MT474047- MT474052 for the GII.P31/GII.4 strains.
